title: Day 4 of Champ concept challenge - Glaastal the void tainted healer
body:
Born into a tribe of healers Clarissa was slightly different, she could hear voices and sounds but when she looked they were nowhere to be seen, this haunted her for years until one day she was healing a prophet who began speaking to her as if he could hear the voices that she heard “he is the prophet of the void” “get him to show you the glory…” they trailed off, (as per usual) before she could understand what they said. The injured man spoke up, “my name is malzahar, I am a prophet, I am here to bring tainted to the void” He coughed and spluttered, “You need to be still and get some rest before you are ready to continue to talk” Clarissa said in a calm voice.

The next day malzahar was not in his bed and clarissa woke to him at her bedside, “come to the void with me, we need a healer who can work with us void people” he stated, this confused her, “what is the void” she said “not what, where” malzahar spoke. “Soon” the voices in her head spoke, malzahar spoke “indeed, just come with me to the void and I will show you the voices” before clarissa could respond a portal opened up right in front of her and she was dragged through.

Upon entering the void an entity appeared “thank you malzahar” he boomed, “clarissa can you help us and heal us so we can wage war on the inhabitants of this pitiful land” now tainted by the void clarissa has the ability to destroy and heal any of those who she chooses. Her name now is glaastal

Glaastal
Support/mage
Ranged
Abilities
Passive

Tainted – Glaastal gains 1 ability power every time she heals an ally, this is doubled when healing a void creature

Q – Void ooze 19/17/15/13/11 Second Cooldown (Cost 60/70/80/90/100 mana) 
Heals all allied champions in the area of 350 units for 60/70/80/90/100 HP (+0.2% of targets missing health)

W – Destructive Boost 25/23/21/19/17 Second Cooldown (Cost 30/60/90/120/150 mana)
Increases target champions Attack damage by 2/3/4/5/6% for 3/4/5/6/7 Seconds

E – Void Ball 7/6/5/4/3 Second cooldown (Cost 30/35/40/45/50 mana)
Throws an orb of void energy towards a target unit
On minions and monsters deals 75/100/125/150/175% of attack damage
On enemy champions deals 80/90/100/110/120 magic damage (+0.25% of ability power)
On allied champions heals them for 25/35/45/55/65 HP (+0.95% of ability power)

R – Super Voidling 215/195/175 Second Cooldown (Cost 125/150/175 mana)
Summons a giant voidling that lasts 10/20/30 seconds that deals 50/75/100 Physical damage (+0.25% of Glaastal’s attack damage), has 0.1% of Glaastal’s armor and magic resist,0 and has 0.4% of Glaastal’s maximum health, upon death deals 200/300/350 magic damage (+0.1% of Glaastal’s ability power) in an explosion of 400/500/600 units. The super voidling takes 30% less damage from turrets and deals 10% less damage to buildings

replies.body: Interesting concept, i like the idea of a void healer :) sounds good
